attributes.action: End tax on tips and overtime.
attributes.additional_details: Families in the uk struggle to make ends meet just on a basic salary and have to work overtime to help pay for family holidays, improve their homes, help make savings. We want to keep our hard earned money from the overtime we make, we’re already taxed on our salary’s.
attributes.background: End all tax on tips and overtime.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712667
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732075
